arStrings.szText: (PH) After the swarm has flown for {c_number}[{SF_13}|2|]{/c} seconds the detonation deals {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} bonus damage in a larger spiral.

(PH) The swarm now pierces while traveling and can be Recast to burst early.

The Cooldown is reduced the closer the swarm is to you upon bursting, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*{SF_15}]{/c} seconds.
